title: Loch Lomond
creator_credit: IFA (Scotland), Films of Scotland and Laurence Henson
brief_description: A study of human and wild life throughout the year, in, on, and around Loch Lomond. Gives a picture of the life and work of a Highland community - the wild life conservator, research biologist, shepherd, farmer and publican, all of whom know the Loch in its many moods.
